00076     struct NotYetImplementedException {
00077     NotYetImplementedException (std::string what) {
00078         std::cerr << what << ": Not yet implemented!" << std::endl;
00079     }
00080     };

00113         static void col_loop (N a[D][D]);

00132     template <unsigned D_>
00133         struct ConstructLoop<D_, 0, 0> {
00134         static void row_loop (N a[D][D]) {
00135     #     if (DEBUG)
00136             cerr << "Matrix<" << D << ">::ConstructLoop<" << D_ << ", "
00137                 << 0 << ", " << 0 << ">::row_loop () : " << 1 << endl;
00138     #     endif
00139         a[0][0] = (N)1;
00140         }
00141         static void col_loop (N a[D][D]) {
00142     #     if (DEBUG)
00143             cerr << "Matrix<" << D << ">::ConstructLoop<" << D_ << ", "
00144                 << 0 << ", " << 0 << ">::col_loop () : " << 1<< endl;
00145     #     endif

00147         }

00285 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00286   inline VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::Matrix() {
00287     ConstructLoop<D, D-1, D-1>::row_loop (data_);
00288   }
00289 
00290 
00303 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00304     inline VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::Matrix(unsigned axis1, unsigned axis2, N alpha) {
00305         ConstructLoop<D, D-1, D-1>::row_loop (data_);
00306         N s = sin (alpha), c = cos (alpha);
00307         data_[axis1][axis1] =  data_[axis2][axis2] = c;
00308         data_[axis1][axis2] = -s;
00309         data_[axis2][axis1] = s;
00310 
00311       }

00313 
00322 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00323   inline VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::Matrix(bool random) {
00324     if (random) {
00325       for(unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00326         for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) data_[i][j] = random? N (rand ())/RAND_MAX: 0;
00327         if (!random) data_[i][i] = 1;
00328       }
00329     }
00330     else {
00331       ConstructLoop<D, D-1, D-1>::row_loop (data_);
00332     }
00333   }
00334 
00335 
00343 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00344     VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::Matrix (const N a[D][D]) {
00345       CopyLoop<D-1, D-1, D>::copy_row (a, data_);
00346     }
00347 
00348 
00358 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00359   VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::Matrix (const N *a) {
00360     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)
00361       for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)
00362         data_[i][j] = a[i*D+j];
00363   }
00364

00366 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00367   inline N
00368     VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::operator() (unsigned i, unsigned j) const {
00369       assert (i < D);
00370       assert (j < D);
00371       return data_[i][j];
00372     }

00384 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00385     inline VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>
00386     VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::operator* (const Matrix<D, N>& other) {
00387       Matrix<D, N> tmp;
00388       Multiply<D>::multiply (data_, other.data_, tmp.data_);
00389       return tmp;
00390     }
00391 
00392 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00393     inline VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>
00394     VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::operator*= (const Matrix<D, N>& other) {
00395       Matrix<D, N> tmp (*this);
00396       Multiply<D>::multiply (tmp.data_, other.data_, data_);
00397       return *this;
00398     }

00400 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00401   void
00402     VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::print () {
00403       std::cout << D << "x" << D << ":";
00404       for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00405         std::cout << (i > 0? " |": "") << std::endl << "|";
00406         for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)
00407           std::cout << std::setw (6) << std::setprecision (3)
00408                     << operator ()(i, j);
00409       }
00410       std::cout << " |" << std::endl;
00411     }

00433   template<unsigned D_, unsigned i, unsigned j>
00434     inline void
00435       VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::ConstructLoop<D_, i, j>::row_loop (N a[D][D]) {
00436 #       if (DEBUG)
00437           cerr << "Matrix<" << D << ">::ConstructLoop<" << D_
00438                << ", " << i << ", " << j << ">::row_loop ()" << endl;
00439 #       endif
00440         ConstructLoop<D, i, j>::col_loop(a);
00441         ConstructLoop<D, i-1, j>::row_loop(a);
00442       }

00456 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00457   template<unsigned D_, unsigned i, unsigned j>
00458     inline void
00459       VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::ConstructLoop<D_, i, j>::col_loop (N a[D][D]) {
00460 #       if (DEBUG)
00461           cerr << "Matrix<" << D << ">::ConstructLoop<" << D_ << ", "
00462                << i << ", " << j << ">::col_loop () : "
00463                << (i == j? (N)1: (N)0) << endl;
00464 #       endif
00465         ConstructLoop<D, i, j-1>::col_loop(a);
00466         a[i][j] = (i == j? (N)1: (N)0);
00467       }

00581 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00582   template <unsigned i, unsigned j, unsigned k, unsigned D_>
00583     inline void
00584       VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::MultiplyInnerLoop<i, j, k, D_>::loop (const N a[D][D], const N b[D][D], N c[D][D]) {
00585         c[i][j] += a[i][k]*b[k][j];
00586         MultiplyInnerLoop<i, j, k-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);
00587       }

00602 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00603   template <unsigned i, unsigned j, unsigned D_>
00604     inline void
00605       VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::MultiplyInnerLoop<i, j, 0, D_>::loop (const N a[D][D], const N b[D][D], N c[D][D]) {
00606         c[i][j] += a[i][0]*b[0][j];
00607       }

00627 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00628   template <unsigned i, unsigned j, unsigned D_>
00629     inline void
00630       VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::MultiplyColLoop<i, j, D_>::loop (const N a[D][D], const N b[D][D], N c[D][D]) {
00631         c[i][j] = 0;
00632         MultiplyInnerLoop<i, j, D-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);
00633         MultiplyColLoop<i, j-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);
00634       }

00651         c[i][0] = 0;
00652         MultiplyInnerLoop<i, 0, D-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);

00675           MultiplyColLoop<i, D-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);
00676           MultiplyRowLoop<i-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);

00722 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00723   Matrix<D-1, N>
00724     VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::matrix_minor (unsigned i, unsigned j) {
00725       throw new NotYetImplementedException ();
00726       Matrix<D-1, N> tmp;
00727       for (unsigned I = 0, II = 0; I < D; I++)
00728         if (I != i) {
00729         for (unsigned J = 0, JJ = 0; J < D; J++)
00730           if (J != j) {
00731           tmp (II, JJ) = *this (I, J);
00732           JJ++;
00733           }
00734           II++;
00735         }
00736         return tmp;
00737   }

00739 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00740   template<unsigned D_>
00741     inline N
00742       VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::Det<D_>::det (/*const*/ N a[D][D]) {
00743         return SumLoop<D, D-1>::sumloop (a);
00744       }
00745 /*
00746 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00747   template<typename N_>
00748     inline N_
00749       VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::Det<1, N_>::det (/*const// N_ a[1][1]) {
00750         return a[0][0];
00751       }
00752 */
00753 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00754   template<unsigned D_, int i>
00755     inline N
00756       VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::SumLoop<D_, i>::sumloop (/*const*/ N a[D][D])  {
00757         N **tmp1 = Minor<i, 0, D>::minor(a);
00758         N tmp2 = a[i][0]
00759                   * Det<D-1>::det(tmp1)
00760                   * ( (i&1)? -1: 1 )
00761                   + SumLoop<D, i-1>::sumloop (a);
00762         delete[] tmp1;
00763         return tmp2;
00764       }
00765 
00766 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00767   template<unsigned D_>
00768     inline N
00769       VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::SumLoop<D_, 0>::sumloop (/*const*/ N a[D][D]) {
00770         N **tmp1 = Minor<0, 0, D_>::minor (a);
00771         N tmp2 = a[0][0] * Det<D-1>::det (tmp1);
00772         delete [] tmp1;
00773         return tmp2;
00774       }
00775 /*
00776 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00777   template<typename N_>
00778     inline N_
00779       VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::SumLoop <0, 0, N_>::sumloop (const N_ a[1][1]) {
00780         return a[0][0];
00781       }
00782 */
00783 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00784     template<unsigned k, unsigned D_>
00785         inline void
00786             VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::MinorLoop<k, D_>::minorloop (N ** a, N **tmp) {
00787               tmp[k-1] = a[k]+1;
00788               MinorLoop<k-1, D>::minorloop (a, tmp);
00789           }
00790 
00791 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00792     template<unsigned D_>
00793         inline void
00794             VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::MinorLoop<1, D_>::minorloop (N ** a, N **tmp) {
00795               tmp[0] = a[1]+1;
00796             }
00797 
00798 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00799     template<unsigned i, unsigned D_>
00800         inline /*const*/ N **
00801             VecMath2::Matrix<D, N>::Minor<i, 0, D_>::minor (/*const*/ N **a) {
00802               /*const*/ N **tmp = new /*const*/ N* [D-1];  //  watch out for memory leaks here!
00803                                                         //  the caller must free this memory!
00804               for (unsigned k = 1; k < D; k++)
00805                 tmp[k-1] = a[k]+1;
00806               //    MinorLoop<D-1, D>::minorloop (a, tmp);
00807               return tmp;
00808             }
